title: Where is the New Hanover-Brunswick County line between Fort Fisher and Bald Head Island, and is it marked with a sign somewhere on the barrier island strand?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/05/where-is-the-brunswick-new-hanover-county-line-between-fort-fisher-and-bald-head-island/
